description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME:
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Front End Loader Acquistion
#### Reference Number: WS4674767022 
#### Solicitation Number: WS4674767022
#### Publication Date: July 18, 2024
#### Tender Closing Date: August 7, 2024, at 2:00 pm EDT

Parks Canada is issuing a tender for the acquisition of Front-End Loaders. This opportunity is open to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-18MOWR/B.

The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is a competitive procurement. Suppliers interested in becoming pre-qualified under this RFSA can find additional information at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/ws4149837221-doc4149961795](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/ws4149837221-doc4149961795).

Only those suppliers with a valid Supply Arrangement shall be eligible to participate in this tender. Bids must be submitted electronically using Ariba Discovery by August 7, 2024, at 2:00 pm EDT. 

Please note that this tender description incorporates an amendment to the response deadline closing time, which supersedes the previously posted notice on Ariba Discovery.

Solicitation Details
-----------------
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4674767022
* **Publication Date:** July 18, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 7, 2024, at 2:00 pm EDT
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person:** Chantal DesGroseilliers
* **Contact Email:** chantal.desgroseilliers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

This project endeavours to secure the procurement of a Front End Loader. Suppliers interested in participating in the bidding process must have a valid Supply Arrangement under RFSA E60HS-18MOWR/B. 

All interested suppliers are advised to register for a profile with the Ariba Discovery portal and actively monitor the system for upload of documents and modifications to the tender requirement. 

For any additional information regarding the tender or for any inquiries, please contact Chantal DesGroseilliers at chantal.desgroseilliers@tpsgc
